overview:
Joerg is the Managing Director for the APAC. In this role, Joerg oversees the strategy development as well as the operational sales activities for Netbiscuits in the Asia Pacific region. Joerg has over 14 years of experience in business development and marketing, most of which have been in the Internet, Media and Telecommunication industries. Joerg has also spent over 12 years in various parts of Asia, including Singapore, Korea and Hong Kong and is highly connected in the Telecommunications and Internet ecosphere in the region.

Joerg is a frequent speaker at Internet, Media and Telecom conferences and currently serves as a Board Member of the Asia Chapter of the Mobile Entertainment Forum (MEF). He has earned a Post-Graduate Degree in Business Administration from the University of Berlin.
